M1AUD.original: ~z~Rojo, rojo. Hit the brakes, man.
~z~So, Niko, this is Manny - we grew up together.
~z~Good! Alright, hey, how's the camera?
~z~Yes. Yes, yes, yes. Very cool. Good.
M1_HH
~z~Not fucking cool, man!
M1_GB
~z~-Can you tape us...?~n~-Just don't even...
~z~A kid dies tonight, man, on your head it be. Get outta here.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~要是今晚有孩子死了，伙计，就全是你的责任。你走吧。

M1AUD.original: ~z~So you and Mallorie is tight, huh? She and your cousin is together now.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你和Mallorie关系很好是吧？现在她跟你堂兄在一起了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Sorry.
M1_LD
M1_JA
~z~Aw man, you gonna lose him.
~z~I wish I had a damn pen. Fuck, man.
~z~I thought you had passion in your veins, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我以为你的血管里流动着满满激情，伙计。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_AC
~z~You know, when I really start talking the truth, how come Jay's not around man?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~每次我触及真理的时候，怎么Jay就是不在呢，伙计？

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EH
~z~You mean here?
~z~Okay.
~z~Manny!
~z~You think Jesus started breaking shit up when those disciples followed him around with a bit of parchment?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你觉得耶稣被一群拿着羊皮纸的信徒追随的时候会开始摔东西吗？

M1AUD.original: ~z~He should be filming me every second.
~z~That's my bad. Boo fucking hoo. See you around, Manny.
M1_IA
M1_GH
M1_A_GA
~z~Sure, but I don't think you hear me.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~当然，不过你好像没听见我的话。

M1AUD.original: M1_WA
~z~I for one ain't in this shit for the ego trip.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我来这里又不是为了做英雄梦。

M1AUD.original: ~z~-Turn this way. Yeah. Looking at me.~n~-Five, six, seven and eight.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－往这儿转。对。朝我看。~n~－五 六 七然后八。

M1AUD.original: ~z~That's right, follow me, but be prepared. Street life ain't pretty.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~没错，跟我来，做好心理准备，街头生活可不漂亮。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I guess the streets is going to have to stay dirty for a little longer. See you, Manny.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我想街道只能再脏上一段时间了。之后见，Manny。

M1AUD.original: ~z~-Hi.~n~-Hi.
~z~Thank you very much, that'll be all for today, thanks a lot.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~非常感谢你们，今天就到这儿了，多谢。

M1AUD.original: ~z~It's for the love, man. They know me coz I help people, man. I'm all love for these streets.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~是为了爱，伙计。人认识我是因为我帮了他们，伙计。我对街道心怀大爱。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yeah here, right here, right here, turn around, man, right here.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~对，这边，就这边，就这边，转过来，伙计，就这边。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I mean, you taught them these moves, right?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我是说，他们的动作是你教的，对吧？

M1AUD.original: ~z~This film is my gospel, man. The gospel of the streets.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~这部影片就是我的福音书，伙计。街道的福音书。

M1AUD.original: ~z~He's not around because I'd break his camera if he shoved it in my face again.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~因为只要他敢拍我，我就会把他的相机砸烂。

M1AUD.original: ~z~It's not good.
~z~More senseless death and the police aren't even here yet.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~又是无谓的死亡，而警察都还没到达现场。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yes, good, good, perfect, cool, cool, cool.
~z~The kids have to look up to me, man. To know that the clean path is the good path. You hear me?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~孩子们以我为榜样，伙计。能学到干净的路才是正道。听见了吗？

M1AUD.original: ~z~It's for the kids, man. Believe that.
~z~Ok, yeah, great, so, eh, so you know streets take no prisoners, right?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~好，对，很好。那个，你知道街道对敌人绝不手软，对吧？

M1AUD.original: M1_HI
M1_GC
M1_GA
~z~This is the one, man - we're gonna get a really nice shot of them, it's going to be beautiful.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~就是这样，伙计。要把他们一起拍进去，效果会很棒的。

M1AUD.original: M1_ZA
~z~"Help" has only one name on the streets of South Bohan - Manny Escuela.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~South Bohan的「救星」只有他一个－Manny Escuela。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Something else came up, I couldn't do it.
~z~The dealer and his drug wagon are up there. Pull up behind and we wait.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~毒贩子和他装毒品的车都在那儿。停到他后面，见机行事。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Chill, Niko. You got to get used to being filmed man.
~z~Yeah, right here. Wait... where are you going?
M1_LA
M1_A_BD
~z~I think that's as much of a decision of Mallorie's as it is Roman's.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我想Mallorie的选择也很重要，和Roman一样。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I don't know how we tailing him without wheels.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我不知道没有车我们还怎么跟着他。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You ready for this?
M1_HJ
~z~Shit, you look obvious being that close without a car, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~干，没车还跟那么紧，看上去很明显的，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Ok everyone, that'll be all for today, that was great.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~好了各位，今天就到这儿了，你们表现很棒。

M1AUD.original: M1_KA
~z~I am afraid not.
M1_A_BC
M1_A_DE
~z~-Hey, hey! Please, please, what are you doing? Hey! My...~n~-Hey, hold on a second, man! Wha...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－喂，喂！拜托，拜托，你要干啥啊？喂！我的...~n~－喂，停一下，伙计！哇...

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EK
~z~Alright, okay, well listen, look... here's what were gonna do...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~那好，这样，你听着...我们要这么做...

M1AUD.original: M1_HK
~z~-about cleaning up the streets of Bohan.~n~-Yeah!
~z~If you can't clean up the streets, man, then you can walk on them, man. Get out.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~要是你不能收拾干净街道，就去街上走走吧，伙计。滚吧。

M1AUD.original: M1_GJ
~z~Niko, you punk, man. Behave!
~z~Shit, he'd pulled up. It's almost like you don't care about the kids, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，他停车了。你这人真就不在乎孩子们死活吗，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You taking my money, aren't you? Be my voice. I'm gonna go back and get Jay.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我付你钱了，不是么？替我把话带到。我要回去找Jay了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yo, we need a car if we're gonna clean these streets.
~z~What are you doing?
~z~Okay from the top?
M1_A_DA
M1_A_EF
~z~Pretty good.
~z~You think these streets is safe enough? See for yourself - get out.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你觉得街道现在够安全吗？自己去看看吧，慢走。

M1AUD.original: ~z~How come whenever I say something that really sings.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~怎么每次说出至理名言的时候都这样。

M1AUD.original: ~z~What you doing so close to him?
~z~cam...
~z~You know what I'm saying?
~z~Here Manny Escuela is rapping with a street accomplice
M1AUD.translated: ~z~现在Manny Escuela正在和一名街友讨论

M1AUD.original: ~z~-We wanna make sure that we see them,~n~-Okay.
~z~No amount of scrubbing is going to get this town clean.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~再怎么收拾自由城也干净不了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~How you gonna follow him without a car?
M1_DA
~z~Great, yeah, let's do it.
M1_A_EG
~z~I'm disappointed in you man. I thought we was on the same page. I thought you cared. Get out.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我对你很失望，伙计。我以为我们是一路人。还以为你也在乎。滚吧。

M1AUD.original: M1_EA
~z~For a guy who just lost his home and his business and who now has a price on his head?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~考虑到他刚没了自己的家和事业，还被人重金悬赏，

M1AUD.original: ~z~But, you know, kids need hope.
M1_GM
M1_GI
~z~ I love that girl, man, I love her, man. Your cousin better not be messing with her head.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我爱那女孩，伙计，我爱她，伙计。你堂兄最好别搅得她心烦意乱。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_AA
~z~He gonna see you standing, you right there.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你搁那儿站着，他能不看见你吗。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Just wait 'til you see your face on the screen, man. Maybe you change your mind then!
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你就等着瞧自己在电视上露脸吧，伙计。说不定到时候你就改主意了！

M1AUD.original: ~z~Ice this fool.
~z~Want to hurt these streets, man. They live and breathe.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~会想伤害这些街道，伙计。街道是有血有肉的。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, man. I thought you were the streets man. We need to tail him.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~干，伙计。我还以为你是街道同僚。我们得跟着他。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Looks like he about to stop yo. You best pull up behind him, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~看来他要停车了。你最好在他后面停下，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Me, I'm just after the money.
~z~Everytime the streets is hurt, I hurt inside, man. You cut me deep, man. Get out of here.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~每次街道受伤，我的心就会更痛，伙计。你深深伤害了我。你走吧。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yeah, well, you know, sometimes you gotta break some omelets to make some eggs, you know what I'm saying?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~行，没事，要知道，不经历彩虹怎能见风雨，懂我什么意思吗？

M1AUD.original: ~z~We're gonna get all these dealers off the streets and we're gonna kick their ass and they're gonna know it was me...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~赶跑街上的所有毒贩，把他们揍出屎来，人们就知道我的功劳了...

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yes I am. Turn this way, please?
~z~No.
~z~Yo! What the fuck are you doing?
~z~You looked great.
~z~How's my Roman doing, anyway?
~z~I thought you were going to clean up the streets?
M1_A_EL
~z~You cut them and they bleed. Man, that was good. I should write that down. You got a pen?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~划上一刀，它也会流血。伙计，这话漂亮，我得先记下来。你有带笔吗？

M1AUD.original: ~z~That's us, man, only at a street level.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~那就是我们，伙计，不过我们是街道层面的。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Of course he's seen us now. Shit, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~现在他能不发现我们吗。操蛋，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Not really my scene.
~z~We gotta get some of these dealers off the streets, man, you know?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我们得把街上的一些毒贩赶跑，伙计，知道吗？

M1AUD.original: M1_HG
~z~Turn that off.
~z~-trying to reform their neighbourhood.~n~-Wait!
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－试图以此改革他们的街区。~n~－别啊！

M1AUD.original: M1_YA
M1_A_DG
~z~Only someone who has been to prison gets that close to a man. Hold off, man!
M1AUD.translated: ~z~只有坐过牢的人才会离男人那么近。拉开点，伙计！

M1AUD.original: ~z~I love his optimism.
~z~Shit, Niko. Don't be a punk!
M1_GD
~z~This is starting to annoy me!
~z~Look, I got money. I got... I got money.
~z~Follow him into that warehouse and get rid of the dealers.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~跟他进入仓库，再把毒贩都杀掉。

M1AUD.original: ~z~This is my boyfriend's cousin, the guy I was telling you about, Niko.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他是我男朋友的堂弟，之前跟你说的那个Niko。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Cut him up, boys.
~z~They my people, alright?
M1_A_EI
~z~And I want them to know it was me, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我想让人们知道是我赶跑的，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Oh yeah, yeah, that's a good idea.
~z~Oh, hey, Niko!
~z~This is the guy I told you about...
~z~Shit, we meant to be keeping this shit on the down low. What you doing getting five-oh on our ass?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，我说了要低调做事。你把条子惹上是几个意思？

M1AUD.original: ~z~I don't know why the people out there want to hurt people man?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我不知道为什么这些人会想伤害别人，伙计。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_DD
~z~Philanthropicalism, man, like one of them rich guys who makes computers and cures AIDS and shit.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~心怀大善，伙计。就像那些造电脑啊、治艾滋啊的有钱人。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Get some wheels so we can chase this sucker.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~找辆车子过来，我们好追上这狗逼。

M1AUD.original: ~z~There he be. We gots to follow him to them other leeches, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他走了。我们要跟着他找到其他寄生虫，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You know, when I was stalking this girl in Europe, I found that two car lengths was the best distance.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你知道吗，我在欧洲跟踪姑娘的时候，发现两个车距是最好的距离。

M1AUD.original: M1_RA
M1_GG
M1_A_BB
~z~Okay. And?
M1_LE
M1_HE
M1_QA
M1_A_DC
~z~I can put my foot through your face if you like.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你要是想，我可以往你脸上来一脚。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Last I heard these dealers was up on Grand Boulevard. Let's go take a look, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我最后一次听说这些毒贩是在Grand大街。~n~我们过去看看，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Man, it's almost like you want this scum on the streets.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~伙计，你是存心想让这些人渣在街上害人是吧。

M1AUD.original: M1_BA
M1_CA
~z~Shit, man. Manny's close to everyone who grew up on the streets of South Bohan, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，伙计，Manny跟所有在South Bohan的街道长大的人关系都很好，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~They gotta understand the struggles, yeah...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他们必须明白有多辛苦，是的...

M1AUD.original: ~z~Drop the punk.
M1_AA
M1_PA
~z~You're following him man, not ass raping him. Get back.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你是要跟踪他，伙计，不是雷普他。回来。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_CA
~z~An entrepreneur who's gonna clean this shit up. Money and respect.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~会把这里收拾干净的企业家。名利双收。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EE
~z~Follow don't mean get all up in his shit. It's over.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~尾随可不是这么个意思。全完了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~What you doing firing that thing?
~z~They be sucking the damn life out of these streets.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他们一直在街上吸食别人的血汗。

M1AUD.original: M1_GF
~z~Hey, the message is what's important, man. It don't matter who gives it.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，重要的是意思能传达到，伙计。是谁动的手不重要。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You ever thought about doing some TV? You might be able to get a series off the back of mine, you know?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你想过录电视节目吗？~n~等我拍完说不定能给你拍个专题出来，懂吧？

M1AUD.original: M1_A_DI
M1_A_FA
~z~-I don't mind doing that again and again until I get it right.~n~-Oh, oh, easy, easy Niko.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－我不介意在教会你之前多这样来几次。~n~－哦，哦，放松，放松，Niko。

M1AUD.original: ~z~No, no, not at all. It's a very manly kind of dancing.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~不，不，完全不像。这种舞姿很男人的。

M1AUD.original: M1_HM
~z~Well, that's my testimony, man.
~z~Do I look gay?
~z~for real, you know what I'm saying?
~z~How we going to clean up these streets if there's cops on us, man? Lose the heat.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~身后有条子跟着我们还怎么整治街道啊，伙计？摆脱通缉。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Niko Bellic: Street Justice, bro!
~z~Yeah? Great! Listen, Mallorie, would you, uh,
~z~You on crack man? Get away from him.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你是吸了毒吗，伙计？离他远点。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EB
~z~Best of both worlds, man. I see myself that way, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~两个领域都是最好的，伙计。我觉得我就是这种人，伙计。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EA
~z~I'm paying you to follow him so do it, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我花钱让你跟踪他，你就照做，伙计。

M1AUD.original: M1_CB
~z~I don't think we sent an invitation to this punk. Eject him from the party.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我不认为我们给这傻逼发了邀请。把他赶出去。

M1AUD.original: M1_HD
M1_HB
~z~Hey did it look good? Huh? Was it a good mixture of that sadness and resolve?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，效果还好吗？哈？是不是融悲伤与决心为一体？

M1AUD.original: ~z~We gonna clean 'em up.
M1_GK
~z~Do you tell them "To get famous."?
~z~Fine, just don't point the camera at me when you're doing it.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~行，你们只管赶，别朝我拍就行。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I like your vibe, man. I like it. You're out to make money but you want to make a difference too, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我喜欢你的风格，伙计。我喜欢。赚钱谋生的同时，也想要有所作为，伙计。

M1AUD.original: M1_HN
M1_LB
M1_A_AB
M1_A_BA
~z~who beat up all those thugs in Broker?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他单枪匹马干翻了Broker的那些暴徒。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Sure.
~z~See, it's the streets man, but people gotta understand the struggles...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~看，街道大家庭。伙计，但各位一定要明白背后的付出...

M1AUD.original: ~z~He going see you, man.
~z~What were you saying?
~z~This dealer's going to see us if we rolling with all this heat, man! You gotta shake the cops, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~这么招摇的话会被毒贩发现的，伙计！你得甩掉警察，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~He going to propose, right? He's going to make an honest woman of her, right?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他要求婚，对吧？他会对Mallorie负起责任的，对吧？

M1AUD.original: M1_GL
~z~Yeah, I'm an entrepreneur, man. You got to have some money if people is gonna respect you out there, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~对，我是个企业家，伙计。有钱才能让别人尊重你，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~This boy think he can come up in our shit. Drop him.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~这个小子认为他能挺住我们的活力。放倒他。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You look good.
~z~Yeah, well, you know, we gotta clean up some eggs, brother.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~对，你也知道，我们得收拾些风雨，兄弟。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Yo, chill on the shooting, man. We trying to keep this shit on the down low.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，先别想着开枪，伙计。现在我们得低调一点。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I'm clean, man. Serene. Fucking serene.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我很干净，伙计。清白，一清二白。

M1AUD.original: M1_OA
~z~How'd you let him get away? Man, shit
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你怎么能放跑他呢？伙计，真是。

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EC
~z~Good, good, good. Right over here.
~z~Don't let him shake you.
M1_A_ED
~z~People say to me, "Manny why you do this? Why you want to clean up the streets so bad? What's your passion?"
M1AUD.translated: ~z~人们对我说，「Manny，为什么这样做？你怎么这么想整治街区？你的动力是什么？」

M1AUD.original: ~z~What's this fool think he's playing at? Finish him.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~这傻逼以为在和谁作对？办掉他。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I didn't know you and Mallorie was that close.
~z~Stay off him, we need to find them leeches.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~离他远点，我们得找到那伙寄生虫。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Cut.
~z~In which case you've got help.
~z~It's two car lengths, right? That's how far you stay behind a woman when you're harassing her?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~两辆车的距离，对吧？骚扰女人的时候也是这个距离吧？

M1AUD.original: M1_A_DF
M1_XA
~z~What I seen of it at least.
~z~Shit, man. You don't need to fire that thing until we find the rest of those suckers, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我靠伙计。我们找到其他毒贩之前你没必要开枪。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Oh, I'm sorry.
M1_A_DH
M1_GE
~z~Wrong warehouse, bitch.
~z~I thought you was going to clean shit up. For me and these streets. For these people man, my people.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我以为你会把街道清理干净。为了我和街道，为了这里的人们，伙计，为了我的子民。

M1AUD.original: M1_TA
~z~You lost him, man. He probably selling drugs to kids right now.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你跟丢他了，伙计。他现在可能在向孩子们卖毒品了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I always wanted to be a well-known idiot.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~确实，我一直想当一个出名的白痴。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Okay, so here we go then... yeah...
~z~-Okay, go.~n~-Yeah, beautiful, beautiful, alright.
M1_SA
~z~This boy's got personal space issues, man. Stay back.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~他也需要有私人空间，伙计。退后点。

M1AUD.original: M1_LC
~z~Wh... what do you mean it's no good?
~z~So how do I look, man?
~z~-What?~n~-Okay.
~z~Apparently the mob teaches people to stay two car lengths behind a target.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~黑帮都会和要跟踪的目标保持两辆车的距离。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You got too close, man. He saw us.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你跟得太近了，伙计。被他看见了。

M1AUD.original: ~z~-give us a little space please? Thanks.~n~-Alright, alright...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－给我们腾个位置吧？谢了。~n~－好的，好的...

M1AUD.original: ~z~Man, you hit him. No way we can get the rest of them leeches now!
M1AUD.translated: ~z~伙计，你撞上他了。现在我们不可能找到其他寄生虫了！

M1AUD.original: ~z~I don't know if he's grown up enough to make a good husband. What's it to you anyway?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我不知道现在他能否当一个好丈夫。不过跟你有什么关系？

M1AUD.original: M1_HA
~z~You gay or something man? Stay away from his ass.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你丫同性恋吗？离他屁股远点。

M1AUD.original: ~z~You sound like you got something else in your veins.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~听起来你的血管里不止这点东西。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Niko, you made a promise to me, man. Your bond is your word, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~Niko，你跟我可说好了，伙计。说话要算数，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Step on it, man. I need you close to this guy, but not too close. You hear me?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~快点，伙计。我需要你跟紧他，但也别跟太紧。懂了吗？

M1AUD.original: M1_A_EJ
~z~-What?~n~-Oh, oh, oh, oh.
~z~Not really.
~z~-These criminals are...~n~-Wait, wait, wait a second.
~z~Okay, well just keep looking at me, but stand over there, okay?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~好，你往我这儿看，人往那边站，好吧？

M1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, man. He seen us. He ain't never gonna go to his boys now.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~该死，伙计，他看见我们了。他不可能去找他的同伙了。

M1AUD.original: M1_HF
~z~He stopped at the red.
~z~Look, brother, will you help? Please?
~z~Shit. He stopped again. Hold back.
~z~Hey, yeah, yeah, yeah. Whassup, man? Streets, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~嘿，耶，耶，耶。咋样伙计？街道，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~I ain't touched that shit in years. Who you been talking to, man?
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我好多年没碰那玩意了。你把我当什么人啊，伙计？

M1AUD.original: M1_FA
M1_A_DB
~z~You know, these streets is mine, man! I can feel them flowing through my veins.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~知道吗，这片街区是我的，伙计！我能感觉到它在我的血管中流动。

M1AUD.original: M1_HL
~z~-The fearsome street warrior stands outside the site of another gangland massacre. Oh...~n~-Yeah... 'sright...
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－罪犯畏惧的街道战士正站在另一起黑社会大屠杀的现场外。哦...卡。~n~－对...是这样...

M1AUD.original: ~z~Could you walk out of there just one more time? We need to get the shot just right.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~你能不能再从里面出来一次？我们拍到这个镜头的时机得合适。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Let me see you work! This way?
~z~That guy gets away there'll be more drugs on the street, killing our kids.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~给那家伙跑了的话街上会有更多毒品的，会害死孩子的。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Shit, how about that for a title? 'Manny's Street Gospel' man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~我靠，要么就叫这名字吧？《Manny的街道福音》，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~-okay, but we want to see you, too.~n~-Just film it, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~－好，但也得拍到你。~n~－直接拍吧，伙计。

M1AUD.original: ~z~Man, I thought you was serious about cleaning up these streets, man.
M1AUD.translated: ~z~伙计，我还以为你是真的想清理街道。
